mapper.select: SELECT id, business_date, is_active, business_type, created_at FROM business_days ORDER BY business_date DESC
SELECT id, business_date, is_active, business_type, created_at FROM business_days WHERE is_active = TRUE ORDER BY business_date ASC
SELECT id, business_date, is_active, business_type, created_at FROM business_days WHERE id = #{id} LIMIT 1
SELECT id, business_date, is_active, business_type, created_at FROM business_days WHERE business_date = #{businessDate} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO business_days (business_date, is_active, business_type) VALUES (#{businessDate}, #{isActive}, #{businessType})
